description: This template deploys a MonetaryUnit node on an Ubuntu VM. MonetaryUnit is primarily focused on transaction speed for users, and is best-suited to developers looking to build on top of MonetaryUnit's speed-centric blockchain. This also enables Ubuntu's UFW firewall, and enables automatic security updates, both of which are considered necessary steps to running a secure MonetaryUnit node.
summary: Deploys a MonetaryUnit full node for quick and easy blockchain access.
